commandDescription: Prints a greeting and your org id(s)!
schemaCommandDescription: create CSV file with org Metadata including objects, fields, record types, dependent picklist etc.
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the organization '%s'.
msgFlagDescription: comma seperated list of Objects to export
pathFlagDescription: File Name with full Path to create Excel File
objectFlagDescription: Comma Seperated API name of objects to get field metadata Info
